content: it s just a knit basket instructions cast on 6 stitches on us11 using magic loop or dpns place a marker and begin working in the round round 1 kfb 12 sts round 2 and all even rounds until round 16 purl materials round 3 k1 kfb repeat to end of round 18 sts round 5 k2 kfb repeat to end of round 24 sts yarn 1 skein berroco macro round 7 k3 kfb repeat to end of round 30 sts 112yd/250g or other jumbo yarn round 9 k4 kfb repeat to end of round 36 sts needle us11 needles 32 for magic loop round 11 k5 kfb repeat to end of round 42 sts or double points and 24 round 13 k6 kfb repeat to end of round 48 sts round 15 k7 kfb repeat to end of round 54 sts gauge and size round 16 k2tog knit to end of round 53 sts 9 sts x 15 row to 4 inches now you ll knit the rest of the basket start by removing 8 tall x 8 diameter the beginning of round marker then repeat p1 k3 abbreviations until basket is desired height our sample is 8 tall kfb knit front back increase 1 last row bind off knitwise to last stitch cast on one k knit stitch with knitted cast on knit 2 *slide to other end of p purl needle and knit 2 repeat from * until you have a 3 long 2 k2tog knit next 2 stitches together stitch i-cord k2tog cut yarn and pull through last stitch decrease 1 attach other end of i-cord to basket weave in ends sew on button darnknitanyway com ©2024 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful crochet items for yourself or your loved ones
